channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16995] Build client Java API and client protobuf messages
item.description: Extend the existing Java API and protobuf messages to allow the client to set filesystem-use quotas via the Master.
item.summary: Build client Java API and client protobuf messages

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: .001 First wag at the client-side. No bindings on backend.
.002 More unit tests and adds some missing deserialization logic that I noticed was missing when working on HBASE-16996.
Please put on review board when the patch is ready for review.

-1 overall

Please put on review board when the patch is ready for review.

Will do, Ted Yu. I wanted to at least get a first implementation of the spectrum before asking for reviewers' time. Getting close – end of this week, I'm hoping.

.003 is a rebase and a missed enum value for violation policies as described in the design doc.

After the patch I put up on HBASE-16998, we're getting close to the semblance of a real "feature". As such, I'm going to start pushing these through code review.
